Deprecated API

Contents

  • Classes
  • Fields
  • Methods
  • Deprecated Classes
    Class
    Description
    com.gmail.murcisluis.base.common.api.Lang
    Use LocalizationManager instead. This class is kept for backward compatibility and will be removed in a future version. Migration guide: - Replace Lang.PREFIX with LocalizationManager.FrameworkMessages.getPrefix() - Replace Lang.NO_PERM with LocalizationManager.FrameworkMessages.getNoPermission() - Replace Lang.reload() with LocalizationManager.getInstance().reloadAllLanguages() - Use LocalizationManager for custom messages and multi-language support
    com.gmail.murcisluis.base.common.api.Settings
    Use ConfigurationManager instead. This class is kept for backward compatibility and will be removed in a future version. Migration guide: - Replace Settings.getConfig() with ConfigurationManager.getInstance().getConfig("config.yml") - Replace Settings.reload() with ConfigurationManager.getInstance().reloadConfig("config.yml") - Use ConfigurationManager.FrameworkSettings for framework-specific settings
    com.gmail.murcisluis.base.common.api.utils.Common
    This class will be refactored in future versions to reduce static dependencies. Consider using LocalizationManager directly for messages.
  • Deprecated Fields
    Field
    Description
    com.gmail.murcisluis.base.common.api.Lang.COMMAND_USAGE
    Use LocalizationManager.FrameworkMessages.getCommandUsage(String) instead.
    com.gmail.murcisluis.base.common.api.Lang.NO_PERM
    Use LocalizationManager.FrameworkMessages.getNoPermission() instead.
    com.gmail.murcisluis.base.common.api.Lang.ONLY_PLAYER
    Use LocalizationManager.FrameworkMessages.getPlayerOnly() instead.
    com.gmail.murcisluis.base.common.api.Lang.PREFIX
    Use LocalizationManager.FrameworkMessages.getPrefix() instead.
    com.gmail.murcisluis.base.common.api.Lang.RELOADED
    Use LocalizationManager.FrameworkMessages.getReloadSuccess() instead.
    com.gmail.murcisluis.base.common.api.Lang.UNKNOWN_SUB_COMMAND
    Use LocalizationManager.FrameworkMessages.getUnknownSubCommand() instead.
    com.gmail.murcisluis.base.common.api.Lang.USE_HELP
    Use LocalizationManager.FrameworkMessages.getUseHelp(String) instead.
    com.gmail.murcisluis.base.common.api.Settings.CHECK_FOR_UPDATES
    Use ConfigurationManager.FrameworkSettings.isUpdateCheckerEnabled() instead.
    com.gmail.murcisluis.base.common.api.utils.Common.PREFIX
    Use Common.getPrefix() instead
  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    com.gmail.murcisluis.base.common.api.Lang.reload()
    Use LocalizationManager.reloadAllLanguages() instead.
    com.gmail.murcisluis.base.common.api.Lang.sendUpdateMessage(String, String)
    Use sendUpdateMessage(String, String, String) instead.
    com.gmail.murcisluis.base.common.api.Lang.sendUpdateMessage(String, String, String)
    Create your own update message using LocalizationManager with your plugin name.
    com.gmail.murcisluis.base.common.api.Lang.sendVersionMessage(String, String)
    Use sendVersionMessage(String, String, String, String) instead.
    com.gmail.murcisluis.base.common.api.Lang.sendVersionMessage(String, String, String, String)
    Create your own version message using LocalizationManager with your plugin name.
    com.gmail.murcisluis.base.common.api.Settings.getConfig()
    Use ConfigurationManager.getConfig(String) instead.
    com.gmail.murcisluis.base.common.api.Settings.reload()
    Use ConfigurationManager.reloadConfig(String) instead.
